
```{r table, echo=FALSE}
out_list()$df
```



```{r plot, echo=FALSE}
plot(out_list()$gypRate, out_list()$ben.net, type = 'l',
     xlab = 'Gypsum rate (Mg/ha)', ylab = 'Estimated net benefit over time period ($/ha)')
abline(v = 10, col = 'red')
```
